DOC.detailed_description: Little known mental physical health effect follow modern , idealized fitness lifestyle . The lifestyle characterized selective restrictive eat behavior , strength training use supplement . The athlete emphasize value stay lean , muscular define , motivate inspires follower social medium . This study recruit observe group competitive female fitness athletes typical 3 month diet period prepare contest . Before contest diet initiate , athlete screen select aspect psychological physical health . The screening repeat two week prior first seasonal contest , finally one month post-contest season . During diet period 3 month , athletes answer brief questionnaire email eating- training behavior mood , also report dietary intake telephone interview . Recreational physically females , plan fitness contest , recruit serve parallel control group . They perform physical psychological screening , answer questionnaire throughout fitness contest diet period .
